entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 05:41 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of light snow this morning and ending early this afternoon then clearing. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
